Name: Endor
Message to Mitty (500 or fewer letters/s:
Hey Mitty! I wish I could find the words to fully express just how thankful I am for finding you. Because of you, I've improved my art skills tremendously, made many amazing friends, and had lots of laughs. You're the sweetest little bean I've had the pleasure of watching. We love you just as much as you love us, and on this special day, we'll show you how much love that truly is.
Happy Valentines, Mitty.

Name: Rellikai
Message to Mitty (500 or fewer letters/s:
Before discovering you, I thought I knew what it meant to have a "vtuber oshi", but I was wrong. I had vtubers/creators that I enjoyed, entertained me, made me laugh, or that I thought were cute. But I had never found one that seemed to fit so perfectly into a slot in my soul that I never even knew had been empty before. 
I hope one day you might come to fully realize & appreciate just how much you've affected, inspired, and made the lives of so many people so much better!

Name: Nova Dysnomia
Message to Mitty (500 or fewer letters/s: Happy Valentine's Day Mitty! Thank you for everything you do for us, and for always making us feel welcomed and appreciated!

Name: Nilok
Message to Mitty (500 or fewer letters/s: Happy Valentines Day Mitty! We wanted to get you a bouquet of flowers, but we couldn't sneak down to a planet to get any without you noticing, so we hope you can accept us instead!

Name: WCTB
Message to Mitty (500 or fewer letters/s:
You're a crybaby gooner who is somehow too shy to goon and can never keep up a decent sleep schedule.
Still, your antics always make me smile, you're bursting with fun ideas, and I know you'll do right by everyone when it counts.
So proudly puff out your (flat) chest and keep fearlessly being a weird, smelly blue gremlin.

Name: m2x2p
Message to Mitty (500 or fewer letters/s: Thank you for Playing silly games and make me laugh.  <3

Name: Gotz
Message to Mitty (500 or fewer letters/s:
I am but a humble lucky charm,
Just one of many, I confess,
the stars outside my window shine,
I wish on them as I rest.

Oh little stars please grant my wish,
and let it be when I wake,
A tender hope that she'll be there,
with a big smile on her face.

Laying here, this lonely night,
gazing up at stars so pretty,
The only wish I'm dreaming of,
is to spend each day with Mitty!

Mitty and the Lucky Charms,
who knows what things we'll do?
All I know, is that we're glad,
To do them all with you!
